sentences.sentence: A photograph of my mother sits on an easel next to the urn.
sentences.translation: 在骨灰盒边上有一个画架，上面放着我母亲的大照片。

sentences.sentence: In this room you can also find Aleksandr's easel and palettes.
sentences.translation: 在这个房间你也可以发现亚历山大的画架和调色板。

sentences.sentence: His studio was a smallish upstairs bedroom; it didn't even have an easel.
sentences.translation: 画室在楼上的房间，有点小，连画架也没有。
